name: CHAINED (itch) (Alpaca Entertainment)
description:
You and your buddy are stuck to chains and you must collect a 100 of  those cube thingys to free yourself (you make up the lore yourself), whoever frees themselves first wins.

Click the Restart button to start over again once someone wins. Also it is possible for both players to win though chances are slim.

If you have suggestions for anything you can comment below
